name: Turteen

abilities.name: Aquatic
abilities.desc: Increase the possessor's Water-type moves' power to 50%.

abilities.name: Tough Shell (Secret)
abilities.desc: Prevent critical hit from opponent's moves.

description: Turteen are very shy Pok√©mon who love to stay hidden within their shells most of the time. Their shells are specially designed so that water can easily flow in. The stored water can later be used as water beam to defend themselves.
